section.name: Editing a document
section.p: To edit a document, users must first locate and select it in the Browse perspective. A list of actions will be displayed in the Actions pane and if the user has the appropiate rights this list will contain an action called 'Edit'. (listing 1)

img.alt: Select a document to see the 'edit' action.

p.em: Listing 1: The document named 'yourArticle' is selected and it's actions are loaded.

section.p: Clicking the 'Edit' link will open the document in a new editor perspective and the user can start editing (listing 2). When the user has finished editing he can save his changes by clicking 'Save' in the Actions pane. The changes will be persisted and the tab will be closed.

p.em: Listing 2: A document named 'yourArticle' is currently being edited. The introduction field shows a rich-text editor widget.
